episodes.synopsis: Newly orphaned Henrietta is taken in by a secret Italian agency, where she trains, along with her "sibling" Jose, to become a lethal assassin.
episodes.title: Fratello (Siblings)

episodes.synopsis: Henrietta is doing her best to try and fit in at the agency. Jose does his best to help her become the worthiest assassin the agency's ever seen.
episodes.title: Orione (Orion)

episodes.synopsis: Rico is given a new body by the agency, but she must obey their every command. Rico meets Emilio, and his vibrant personality rubs off on her.
episodes.title: Ragazzo (Boy)

episodes.synopsis: The Hilshire-Triela fratello must find and protect Mario Bossi, a retired criminal who's a government witness with a bounty on his head.
episodes.title: Bambola (Doll)

episodes.synopsis: A former military policeman injured on the job is given new life when he's offered a job at the agency, and is teamed up with young assassin Claes.
episodes.title: Promessa (Promise)

episodes.synopsis: Jose and Henrietta must stop notorious terrorist Enrico Berdini from acquiring an explosive device and setting off an attack on Rome.
episodes.title: Gelato (Ice Cream)

episodes.synopsis: Jean and Rico must try to protect an accountant who's unaware he holds a ledger that a major terrorist will do anything to acquire.
episodes.title: Protezione (Protection)

episodes.synopsis: Angelica was left for dead after being hit by a car. But the agency brought her back to life, enhancing her with cybernetic technology.
episodes.title: Il Principe del Regno Della Pasta (The Prince of the Kingdom of Pasta)

episodes.synopsis: New recruit Elsa is as cold as ice, and tensions rise when she has to work together with Jose and Henrietta on a dangerous mission.
episodes.title: Lycoris Radiata Herb (Cluster Amaryllis)

episodes.synopsis: A murder sets off a chain of events that has Jose and Henrietta being sent away for protection. They wonder if the agency's involved in a cover-up.
episodes.title: Amare (To Love)

episodes.synopsis: Henrietta and Jose head to Sicily for a much-needed vacation, but they're being followed. Pietro and Elenora question Henrietta about Elsa's death.
episodes.title: Febbre Alta (High Fever)

episodes.synopsis: Claes is used as a decoy to prevent a kidnapping. Now, she needs the agency's assistance to help her break out of the terrorists' stronghold.
episodes.title: Simbiosi (Symbiosis)

episodes.synopsis: Henrietta tells Marco he has to be by Angelica's side while she lies in the hospital. The girls are excited to see a meteor shower.
episodes.title: Stella Cadente (Falling Star)

video.title: Gunslinger Girl
video.synopsis: On the surface, the Social Welfare Agency appears to help orphaned schoolgirls, but it's actually turning them into lethal agents.
